it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingView, TextView

    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class the represent the User Interface, according to the "MVC" pattern

      • askName

        public abstract java.lang.String askName(boolean reask)
        Ask user to input his game name
        Parameters:
        reask - signals if Game Controller is reasking the input because not valid
        Returns:
        a String representing the selected name

      • askMovement

        public abstract Coordinates askMovement(boolean reask)
        Asks input from user about the movement of his player
        Parameters:
        reask - signals if Game Controller is reasking the input because not valid
        Returns:
        A Coordinate object with the selected coordinates
        See Also:
        Coordinates

      • askForNoise

        public abstract java.lang.String askForNoise()
        Asks input from user about where declare noise
        Returns:
        coordinates in form of String

      • askItemUse

        public abstract int askItemUse(java.lang.String objects,
                               boolean fromDiscardCall)
        Asks the selection of an item from user input
        Parameters:
        objects - the currently owned item cards coded as a String
        fromDiscardCall - signals if the call of this methods comes from a discard cards phase
        Returns:
        the index of the item selected

      • askHumanItemDiscard

        public abstract int askHumanItemDiscard(java.lang.String objects)
        Asks user if wants to discard or use an owned card to get a free slot for the recently drawn one
        Parameters:
        objects - the owned items in form of string
        Returns:
        the index of the item selected (or the index of "don't discard")

      • askAlienItemDiscard

        public abstract int askAlienItemDiscard(java.lang.String objects)
        Asks the user if wants to discard an owned card to get a free slot for the recently drawn one
        Parameters:
        objects - the owned items in form of string
        Returns:
        the index of the item selected (or the index of "don't discard")

      • askForAttack

        public abstract java.lang.String askForAttack()
        Asks input from user about the attack of his player
        Returns:
        true if user wants to attack, false otherwise

      • askForLights

        public abstract Coordinates askForLights(boolean reask)
        Asks user to input the coordinates of the sector he wants to enlight
        Parameters:
        reask - signals if Game Controller is reasking the input because not valid
        Returns:
        A Coordinate object with the selected coordinates

      • showActualSituation

        public abstract void showActualSituation(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String position,
                                         java.lang.String objects,
                                         java.lang.String turn)
        Shows to user the actual situation at the beginning of his turn
        Parameters:
        name - name of the user
        position - actual position
        objects - the owned items in form of string
        turn - current turn of the game

      • notifyEscape

        public abstract void notifyEscape(boolean escaped,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String shipnumber)
        Notifies to user the (failed or succeeded) escape of a player
        Parameters:
        escaped - signals if escape has succeeded or failed
        name - the name of the player who's escaping
        shipnumber - the number of the lifeboat ship used

      • showFinalResults

        public abstract void showFinalResults(boolean iWon,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String humanlosers,
                                      java.lang.String humanwinners,
                                      java.lang.String alienwinners,
                                      java.lang.String alienlosers)
        Displays the final results of the game
        Parameters:
        iWon - signals is user won or not
        name - name of the user
        humanlosers - all the human players that have lost
        humanwinners - all the human players that have won
        alienwinners - all the alien players that have won
        alienlosers - all the alien players that have lost

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String position,
                   java.lang.String reachables,
                   java.lang.String objects)
        Receives and shows the updates happened in model after last user actions
        Parameters:
        position - actual position of the player
        reachables - list of all the boxes reachable with a single movement, colored in GUI
        objects - list of the owned item in form of string

      • signalEndOfTurn

        public abstract void signalEndOfTurn()
        Receives a signal of the end of the user turn
